wikipedia_page.main: Matthew Murray (25 December 1929 – 28 April 2016) was a Scottish football outside forward who played in the Scottish League for Kilmarnock, Queen's Park, Ayr United, Morton and St Mirren. He was capped by Scotland Amateurs and Great Britain. Murray also played in the Football League for Barrow and Carlisle United.

response: Matthew or Matt Murray may also refer to:
* Matt Murray (baseball) (born 1970), American Major League Baseball pitcher
* Matt Murray (journalist) (born 1966), editor of the Wall Street Journal
